page.title: 05PALACE PIER
page.content: Brighton originally had three piers but one,the Chain Pier was wrecked in a storm in 1896 .You can still see the remains of the pier at low tide.The two that are left are the West Pier and the Palace Pier.The West Pier was closed down in 1976 because it was unsafe.millions of pounds are needed to repair it.The only pier left open to the public is the Palace Pier.It was built in . There are many different things to do on the pier,including amusements,fair rides etc.There is also an exhibition of antique slot machines which you can use if you have any old pennies. It is free to get onto the pier and the deck chairs are also free unlike on the beach where you have to pay.
